ConfigurationOption.Value: select a.assetnum, a.description, a.parent, a.location, a.status, a.isrunning, a.failurecode, a.priority, a.binnum, a.itemnum, a.serialnum, a.assettag, a.vendor, a.manufacturer, a.installdate, a.glaccount, a.classstructureid, a.siteid, a.assetuid from asset a

Struct._value: := query( 'Asset Downtime', 'Downtime Code', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site} and endstatusid is null' )
:= query( 'Asset Meter Readings', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site}' ) is not null
:= query( 'Spare Parts', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site}' ) is not null
:= query( 'Specifications', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site}') is not null
:= query( "Work Order Lookup", "Asset", "Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site} and (Status = 'COMP' or Status = 'CLOSE' ) " ) is not null
IsInsert() or IsModified("Serial Number") or ${Serial Number} is null
IsInsert() or IsModified("Asset Tag") or ${Asset Tag} is null

EventAction.Condition: ${Asset} is null or query( 'Assets', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset}' ) is not null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please enter a unique Asset number
Asset can not be NULL! Please enter a NEW asset number.
Description can not be NULL! Please enter the description value.
Enter the downtime status change details:
End Date must be after Start Date
Create a copy of the selected asset, or a new asset?

List.ListEntry: a.location in (select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' ) and a.status in ('ACTIVE', 'OPERATING')
